title: [Self-Directed] Customized Information Literacy Workshop for Nutrition Researchers

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary nutrition knowledge and academic research proficiency
context.additional_context: A course to strengthen information evaluation and utilization skills required for mathematics-based nutritional science research.

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate the credibility of nutrition-related academic materials with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can independently search and select statistical data relevant to their research topics from three or more reliable sources.
Learners enhance their ability to systematically organize and analyze information retrieval results according to the ACM standard format.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
